mentions.tacticalSituation: If the Conservatives lose just 12 seats, Labour will take power in a hung parliament. Richmond Park & North Kingston is one of those 12 seats.

housing.content: Labour and Lib Dem manifestos wage war on homeowners.

quotes.text: Labour and Lib Dem manifestos wage war on homeowners.
Labour and Lib Dem tax grabs will take billions.

images.caption: Jeremy Corbyn needs a Liberal Democrat MP here, so he can take power.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet suggests that a vote for the Liberal Democrats could help Jeremy Corbyn become Prime Minister by forming a government, implying a strategic consideration for voters in the Richmond Park & North Kingston constituency.
